code: var counterReducer=function counterReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'INCREMENT':return state+1;case'DECREMENT':return state-1;case'INCREMENTBY5':return state+=action.payload;default:return state;}};export default counterReducer;
